channel.title: identifier renaming on Haruaki TAMADA
channel.description: Recent content in identifier renaming on Haruaki TAMADA

item.title: De-obfuscate IRM
item.description: ðŸ—£ Overview The obfuscation methods are often used to hide sensitive information in software. Especially, an identifier renaming method (IRM) is well used because it is easy to implement. IRM is one of the obfuscation methods, and to change the names of function, and variables into meaningless one. However, if we can restore the identifiers to the original names, IRM is invalidated. One of the serious problems about IRM is that the tolerance against de-obfuscation is not discussed.
